home.intro: Discover premium video services, tailored for weddings, private or professional events.

about.title: About
about.text: Passionate about images and emotions, I capture the present moment and tell your story with authenticity and elegance. Each project is a human adventure, where every glance, word and detail comes to life through a carefully crafted cinematic approach.

packages.note: *Packages include my presence throughout the day (from preparations to the first dance), editing time, equipment amortization, travel expenses and delivery via a personalized video gallery. Add-ons can be included on request.
packages.raw_desc: Delivery of all raw footage from the wedding ceremony.
packages.trailer_desc: 1-minute highlight edit. Perfect for social media.
packages.halfday_desc: Additional half-day coverage, footage added to the final edit.
packages.second_desc: A second videographer for more complete coverage.
packages.special_desc: Dedicated edit of a special moment (civil / religious / secular ceremony, etc.).
